job.title: Data Scientist / Machine Learning SW Engineer
job.description: A global Conversational AI technology company is offering a solutions platform that is fueled by AI and automation technologies The companies vision is to bridge the gap between people and machines through voicebrbrTheyre looking for a world class Data Scientist who is interested in working on the next generation of goal driven conversational models The ideal candidate understands the fast pace of the startup environment and is not intimidated to work on topics that are at the frontier of the research The candidate will work as an individual contributor but it is expected to collaborate and sync up with the other members of the Data Science teambrbrstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongul li3 years of experience in the field of machine learning with a
